DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, this creature gains health equal to half of its #bEssence, rounded down. It loses 1 #bEssence each turn
At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to the total #bFlux on all enemies to each enemy. Each enemy loses 1 #bFlux each turn
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
